goal: Establish 30-day baseline and license underuse, then schedule deltas for Value Realized.

steps.title: Confirm intake payload
steps.instruction: Review captured parameters and confirm scope (rooms, employees, hours, incidents).
steps.expected_output: Signed-off intake payload for baseline run.

steps.title: Create/verify MCP connections
steps.instruction: Ensure MCP tool configs exist and are reachable.
steps.expected_output: All MCP tools registered and authenticated.

steps.title: Capture baseline metrics
steps.instruction: Using MCP tools, pull 30-day baseline: meetings, participants, minutes, room utilization, incident rates, and license utilization.
steps.expected_output: Baseline snapshot persisted with evidence (timestamps, queries, counts).

steps.title: Seed/Update KB in ServiceNow
steps.instruction: Synthesize an executive-readable baseline summary and post to ServiceNow KB; notify Slack.
steps.expected_output: SN KB article link + Slack message URL.

steps.title: Schedule recurring baseline rollups
steps.instruction: Set weekly automation to refresh metrics and track Value Realized deltas.
steps.expected_output: Scheduled workflow entry visible on Dashboard.

acceptance_criteria: Baseline snapshot saved with evidence hashes and timestamps.
KB article created/updated with links to evidence and charts.
Slack notification posted to #av-ops (or configured channel).
how_to_implement: Click “Download SOP JSON” and paste into Chat with /sop.
Review generated Recipe YAML, save it in Recipes.
Attach the recipe to an agent in Agents.
Create a Workflow “Baseline Capture” using that recipe and run it.
View evidence and deltas in Dashboard; schedule weekly runs.
